dc_title_s: Map of the state of Indiana compiled from the United States surveys
dc_description_s: Insets: Michigan City--La Fayette--Logansport & West Logan--Terre Haute--Indianapolis--New Albany, Jeffersonville, Louisville and the Falls of Ohio--Evansville and Lamasco City--Lawrenceburgh--Madison. Inset scales vary. Prime meridian: Washington D.C. Scale 1:316,800. By S.D. King; exhibiting the sections & fractional sections, the situation and boundaries of counties, the location of cities, villages & post offices, canals, rail-roads and other internal improvements.
